channel.title: Max players online help
channel.description: ok well my server is getting more and more popular and before i would have about 30 people online with no lagg or anything and now for some od reason its only letting 12 connect and on the command thing when i try to connect when theres 12 people on line ot doesnt say anything and on screen says error connecting to server i also checked to see how many player it allows and its 100?? whats wrong?? is it the vps im using?

item.title: Max players online help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Your Server is either poorly coded (wL based) or you are running it on a very low speced computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Max players online help
item.dc:creator: @ppl_0wned ppl_0wned
item.description:
@ppl_0wned wrote:

ok that said 2 and i put it to 2000 and only 10 people can get on

Read full topic

item.title: Max players online help
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

Go to server.java and search this :

	public static int MaxConnections

If there stands 12 then u should change that to 10000 or somthing.

Read full topic
